sect3.title: Show Desktop
sect3.para: When the icons on your desktop are hidden by too many open windows, you can now quickly hide them and then bring them all back again by clicking the "Show Desktop" button in the panel.

sect3.title: Run Program
sect3.para: To launch an application that is not already in your panel's menu you can now select, or type, its name in the "Run Program" dialog box. This is much simpler than opening a terminal window, typing the name and closing thee terminal.

sect3.title: Search For Files
sect3.para: You can now quickly find files via the Actions menu.

sect3.title: Open Recent
sect3.para: The Actions menu now lists the last few files that you have opened. Just select the file to open it with the appropriate application.
